cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.NE 

The paper deals with the problem of adversarial perturbations in image classification, which is a topic that falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves a generative approach inspired by GANs, which is a popular technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the importance of building robust models, which is a topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper deals with the security implications of adversarial perturbations, which is a topic in computer security (cs.CR). Finally, the paper proposes a novel approach to generating adversarial perturbations, which involves training a neural network, which is a topic in neural networks (cs.NE).
